title: That moment when you have been posting Breaking Bad Gifs all week
body:
And people have stopped commenting on them
http://media.giphy.com/media/qRkxo6NLYybQI/giphy.gif

replies.body: I just don't want to be a stalker. Not one that people know about, at least.

Oh I fully intend to keep this going for as long as possible. There is a limitless supply of good breaking bad gifs.
http://gifsec.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/02/GIF-Breaking-Bad.gif
Now you have a full season of better call saul to quote from :)
That show is damn near perfect. I fell behind a couple of episodes though (got them recorded), but I plan to catch up this weekend.
lol :) i can't wait for season 2 already damnit

Gotta space them out, play hard to get.

Same problem with chocolate; too much in one sitting and it just gets disgusting. Maybe mix things up a bit with a gif from another source material. People go crazy for "exotic" premiums.
Where is the fun in that?

Do Better Call Saul gifs count?

I mean, he technically has his own show now....

http://photos.vanityfair.com/2015/02/09/54d83d8c73b710d476cfa7ee_bcs-glasses.gif

Is BB *really* that good?

(TO THE BUNKER!)
I feel that feel of a thousand feels
